long_description: You'll reach for this cozy favorite at first nip in the air. The windproof Patagonia Retro-X jacket for women is a high-pile fleece jacket for everything from kite flying to snowshoeing to lounging. Windproof barrier is bonded between furry recycled fleece exterior and a moisture-wicking, breathable brushed polyester mesh lining. Quilted Supplex(R) nylon collar stand and shoulders; spandex binding at cuffs and hem. Outer fleece is 7.5-oz. Synchilla(R) polyester (86% recycled); 0.25 in. pile. Zippered handwarmer pockets lined with a moisture-wicking brushed polyester mesh; Supplex nylon zipper covers on pockets. The Patagonia Retro-X jacket for women features a feminine silhouette. Fleece is 100% recyclable through Patagonia's Common Threads Recycling Program-simply return your worn-out fleece to Patagonia.
short_description: You'll reach for this cozy favorite at first nip in the air. The windproof Patagonia Retro-X jacket for women is a high-pile fleece jacket for everything from kite flying to snowshoeing to lounging.
